articles.author: Steve Gorman
articles.description: The U.S. Marshals Service on Sunday posted a $7,500 reward for any information leading to the capture of the man accused of shooting four people dead in a Montana bar before he vanished, sparking a search for the suspect in the nearby mountains.
articles.title: Reward of $7,500 posted for man wanted on suspicion of shooting 4 dead in Montana bar
